New Records: Ireland reached 157 runs in 19.2 overs, with Andy Balbirnie scoring 62 and Lorcan Tucker 34
Key Match Events: The match was rain-reduced and decided using the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern method; Ireland's batting performance and England's struggles with key losses
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and decided to bowl first but struggled to capitalize on their advantage
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Jos Buttler criticized the team's performance; Ireland advanced in the tournament standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain delays; Ireland's victory marked a significant moment in the tournament
